skills.name: ENTANGLED
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to gain Thorn Shield for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to gain Cyclone Shield for 2 turns.
•Heal self based on your MAGIC stat.

skills.name: CAPTURE
desc: • Grant Damage Reduction Shield to all allies for 2 turns.
• Grant HP Regen to all allies for 2 turns.
• 50% Chance to Taunt all enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: INHIBIT
desc: • Grants Immunity to Stat Decreasing effects for all allies, which includes: ATK, MAGIC, DEF, MR, POWER, and FURY Decreasing effects..
